steps.name: Preconditions: Login as a registered user
Fill the keyword into the Help Center search input field.
Verify search for the input query is visible on the search results page.
Verify go to the page of the selected random article.
Expand the hidden subheadings and get name all subheading.
Verify that clicking on a heading takes you to the name of the heading in the article.
